src:
Antasari Azhar Tepis Isu Dewan Pengawas KPK: Tak Ada Komunikasi Sama Sekali
07 Nov 2019, 07:11 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Mantan Pimpinan KPK Antasari Azhar membantah dirinya ditunjuk sebagai dewan pengawas KPK. Antasari mengaku tidak ada komunikasi sama sekali dengan pihak Istana terkait posisi tersebut.
"Siapa yang nunjuk? Saya aja belum tahu," kata Antasari kepada detikcom, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam.
Antasari enggan berandai-andai jika nantinya benar dipilih sebagai dewan pengawas KPK. Dia menegaskan tidak ada komunikasi dengan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) terkait hal itu.
"Tidak ada komunikasi sama sekali," ucapnya.
Antasari sendiri enggan mengusulkan nama-nama yang cocok menjadi dewan pengawas. Dia menjawab diplomati, akan mendukung siapapun yang cocok menurut Presiden Jokowi.
"Setuju dengan siapa saja yang cocok menurut presiden," tuturnya.
text:
Antasari Azhar Tepis Issues KPK Supervisory Board: No Communication at All
Nov 7 2019, 07:11 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Former KPK Chairman Antasari Azhar has denied he was appointed as a KPK supervisory board. Antasari claimed there was no communication at all with the Palace regarding the position.
"Who pointed out? I don't know yet," Antasari told AFP on Wednesday (11/06/2019) night.
Antasari is reluctant to assume that he will later be elected as the KPK supervisory board. He emphasized that there was no communication with President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) regarding this matter.
"There is no communication at all," he said.
Antasari himself was reluctant to propose names that fit the board of trustees. He answered diplomacy, would support anyone who was suitable according to President Jokowi.
"Agree with anyone who is suitable according to the president," he said.
